title: LSI, Inc. Recalls BBQ Pork Jerky Product  Due To Possible Foreign Matter Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, October 24, 2025 – LSI, Inc., an Alpena, S.D. establishment, is recalling approximately 2,277,540 pounds of a ready-to-eat Korean barbecue pork jerky product that may be contaminated with pieces of metal, the U.S. Department of Agriculture’s Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today...

establishment.name: LSI, Inc.
activities: Certification - Export;  Meat Processing;  Poultry Processing
